description:
Tough hikes call for fun socks. These critter graphic socks are made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that regulates foot temperature to keep your feet warm in the cool and cool in the heat. Cushioned soles keep feet comfortable on multi-day backpacking trips.

  • Cushioned sole and ankle provides great comfort without bulk
  • Ribbed performance knit ensures no slipping, no bunching or blisters
  • True Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Critter Club Lightweight Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Women's
